/usr/bin/c++   -Wall -Wextra -std=c++11 -O2 -g   CMakeFiles/game.dir/code/gf_2048.cc.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/code/local/Board.cc.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/code/local/Grid.cc.o  -o game -rdynamic ../library/libgf0.so.0.6.0 -lSDL2 -lpthread -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system -lfreetype -lz -lgcc_s -lgcc -Wl,-rpath,/home/evan/Documents/Projet_L3/jeu/library:
